participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily is a hands-on person who enjoys working with plants and engaging in activities that bring her closer to nature.
participant_1.background: i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and compassionate, David is a hardworking doctor who cares deeply about his patients and values family above all.
participant_2.background: i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. my daughter is a child prodigy.
